title: A bull graunted by the Pope to Doctor Harding & other by reconcilement and assoyling of English Papistes, to vndermyne faith and allegeance to the Quene. With a true declaration of the intention and frutes thereof, and a warning of perils therby imminent, not to be neglected.
author: Norton, Thomas, 1532-1584.
publisher: By Iohn Daye dwelling ouer Aldersgate,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
